definition: long-term/at a fixed date in the future (e.g. for repayment)/abbr. for 遠期合約|远期合约[yuan3 qi1 he2 yue1]
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手術矯正小兒共同性內斜視的遠期療效。

sentences.english: The tranquilizing and allaying excitement methods had an advantage than common acupuncture group on treating hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神針刺法治療偏頭痛遠期療效優於普通針刺組。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of adjuvant FAM chemotherapy after radical operation of gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃癌根治術後應用輔助化療患者的遠期療效。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. We don't accept postdated checks.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我們不收遠期支票。

sentences.english: Our terms of payment are normally 30 - day bill of exchange, documents against acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 我們的付款方式一般是30天遠期匯票，承兌交單。

sentences.english: In the future, a separation overpass plan would be adopted to resolve the intersection problem totally.
sentences.chinese: 遠期將採用分離式立交方案，徹底解決交叉口問題。

sentences.english: To investigate the long term effects of trabeculectomy on FHU with secondary glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 評價小梁切除術治療FHU繼發性青光眼的遠期療效。

sentences.english: What must he do for the medium and longer term?
sentences.chinese: 對於中期和遠期上他必須做什麼？

sentences.english: After 3 months follow-up, there was no long-term complications.
sentences.chinese: 術後3個月隨訪，無遠期併發症發生。

sentences.english: Long-term effect of small needle scaple therapy for chronic LBP was stable.
sentences.chinese: 小針刀治療慢性下腰痛遠期療效穩定。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long-term effect of orthotopic liver transplantation to patients with hepatic myelopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝移植對肝性脊髓病的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the long term effectiveness of three types of dowel pin as treatment post core crowning.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較3種類型樁釘作樁核冠修復體的遠期療效。

sentences.english: FS can lead to acute and chronic changes of hippocampal structure.
sentences.chinese: FS可導致近期及遠期海馬結構病變。

sentences.english: The forward pulley is large and is generally made from an in-line skate wheel.
sentences.chinese: 遠期滑輪大，一般是車輪製成一種在線滑冰。

sentences.english: Actuals available for delivery are traded for cash on a spot or forward basis.
sentences.chinese: 可供交割的現貨可在即期或遠期基礎上換成現金。

sentences.english: The long- term day carries the ability as 100.
sentences.chinese: 遠期日運載能力爲100萬人次。

definition: bull market (prices appear to be rising)
sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
